data.name: 魔法书起源(Origin of the magic book)
data.detailed_description:
The world is broken after the war between God and the demon clan. Each area will be connected by a transmission array. Players can explore every corner of the world through transmission.



You are summoned to an abandoned hut to start the game.

Ensure adequate food and maintain adequate nutrition, which directly affects the growth rate of the role.

Collect ores and make equipment.

Make magic books and learn magic.

Collect herbs and make potions.

Farming, fishing and cooking.

Capture pets and cultivate friends.

Deal with NPC and complete NPC tasks.

Fight against all kinds of demons.

Challenge the Eternal Maze and defeat the demon king.
data.about_the_game:
The world is broken after the war between God and the demon clan. Each area will be connected by a transmission array. Players can explore every corner of the world through transmission.



You are summoned to an abandoned hut to start the game.

Fight against all kinds of demons.

Challenge the Eternal Maze and defeat the demon king.
data.short_description: Live from scratch in a different world, learn magic, make equipment, defeat demons and become the strongest.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo E6600 @ 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel 4400, GeForce GT 8800, AMD Radeon HD 4650
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i5-2500k@3.3GHz, AMD FX 6300 3.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750, AMD R7 370
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound card
